story.title: Unseen and Unheard - Episode 2
story.storyDescription: Why is Heather‚Äôs boyfriend talking to her like she isn‚Äôt there?
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Charlie Poe is a former Virginia police officer who enjoys writing mysteries and horror. Follow him to read more stories like Unseen and Unheard.

story.prePaywallNotification: What?! Heather is dead?? üò±üëª Tap back into Hooked to see what she and Kira do next.
story.postPaywallNotification: Nice! Kira agreed to meet Heather at the Pizzeria üçïüçï Will Heather be able to prove that she‚Äôs actually alive? Tap back into Hooked to find out.

messages.text: This can‚Äôt be real. I‚Äôm dead?
How am I still here? None of this makes any sense.
You were in an accident.
But I don‚Äôt remember that at all!
The last thing I remember was fighting with Jax over stupid Lauren.
That‚Äôs when it happened. We were at the party. Lauren made a pass at Jax.
I remember. He insisted she was just being nice, I got mad and left.
Then he tried to follow me but I told him I needed to be alone for a bit.
Exactly. You didn‚Äôt even say goodbye. You just turned right back around and left.
I was so mad at you. You were supposed to be my ride.
An hour later, some cops came by and gave us the news‚Äî
You‚Äôd been in an accident. Your car was hit by the drunk truck driver.
Oh my God!
Yeah. Well, they assume he was drunk‚Ä¶
There was beer in the cabin, but they never caught the guy.
Michelle said that the truck was abandoned at the scene of the crime‚Ä¶
But the police didn‚Äôt say anything about it.
They wouldn‚Äôt even let us see the body.
They just came by to tell us the news and make sure WE weren‚Äôt drinking.
God, we just couldn‚Äôt believe it ‚Äî I still can‚Äôt wrap my head around it.
How did they know where to go?
Those stupid party flyers Pete made. They found a bunch in your front seat.
Your mom said she‚Äôll call later with your service time. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre waiting for now.
This can‚Äôt be real. This has to be a nightmare‚Ä¶
I need to wake up.
I wish you could.
Kira‚Ä¶I‚Äôm scared. This is too much.
Too much? Imagine getting texted by your best friend right after she died.
Imagine finding out you ARE dead.
This whole situation is terrible. I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs worse‚Ä¶
If some creep stole my dead best friend‚Äôs phone and knows way, waayyy too much about me‚Ä¶
Or if you are Heather.
And I‚Äôve been texting with my dead best friend.
This is flat-out insane. You‚Äôre the only one who‚Äôs answering me.
Jax isn‚Äôt answering my texts.
My parents aren‚Äôt. No one else is answering. Just you.
Lucky me‚Ä¶
Please‚Ä¶let‚Äôs meet at the Pizzeria, and you can see that it‚Äôs me for yourself.
We can talk through this and try and figure this out. I‚Äôm walking, I guess, so I‚Äôll be there in 30.
Ok. I‚Äôll meet you.
But if you try anything or this is some sort of prank, I‚Äôm calling 911.
I promise, it isn‚Äôt.
30 minutes later
I‚Äôm here, where are you?
Pulling up in one sec.
I see your car.
I don‚Äôt see you at all.
I swear to God, if this is some sort of elaborate joke, I will hunt you down.
What are you talking about?
I‚Äôm right in front of the sign. I‚Äôm the only one here and waving my arm.
I‚Äôm literally 30 feet away.
I‚Äôm staring at the sign now. There‚Äôs nobody there.
I‚Äôve been jumping up and down, yelling ‚ÄúKIRA!‚Äù
How do you not see me?!
Can you not hear me either?
Look.
Kira sends Heather a picture of Pizzeria sign.
No one there.
It‚Äôs been fun, but I‚Äôm done playing games. I‚Äôm leaving and calling the cops.
What‚Ä¶?
But I‚Äôm right here.
KIRA! STOP!
LOOK!!
Heather sends Kira a picture of Kira. She‚Äôs standing in front of her car in the parking lot.
She‚Äôs wearing the exact same outfit in the picture and her hair is styled the same way.
What is going on?
Kira?
What?
Can we try something‚Ä¶??
Just‚Ä¶take two steps forward.
Ok?
Stand still for a second.
WTF. It just got really cold all of a sudden.
I feel it all throughout my body.
What is going on?
Kira‚Ä¶you‚Äôre standing right in front of me.
I just tried to grab your hand‚Ä¶
And I passed right through it.
What do you mean?!
Kira, I‚Äôm here. And you‚Äôre here.
I can see you, but you can‚Äôt see me. You can‚Äôt hear me.
I just tried to touch you, and my hand physically passed through yours.
All you felt was cold.
I can‚Äôt even‚Ä¶
What is this?
Kira, it‚Äôs like we‚Äôre in different dimensions.
Different planes of existence. And that means‚Ä¶
I really AM dead‚Äî
I think I‚Äôm a ghost.
